issue.title: ESP32 interaction with Ultrasonic Sensor
issue.body:
Hey Hieu, 
It has been a while. Happy New Year. I hope you are enjoying the holidays. 
I am having a problem with my ESP32 and the ultrasonic sensor. I will send you pictures and the code file. 
Thanks again. 
-Alex

comment.body: But yes, I will try the code with another sensor.

comment.body: The sensor is brand new. I got it the day I tried running the code and it didn’t work. I don’t know what’s wrong with my layout if there is anything wrong.

issue.title: ESP32 interaction with Ultrasonic Sensor
issue.body:
Hey Hieu, 
It has been a while. Happy New Year. I hope you are enjoying the holidays. 
I am having a problem with my ESP32 and the ultrasonic sensor. I will send you pictures and the code file. 
Thanks again. 
-Alex

comment.body:
It's a bit difficult for me to debug without seeing the hardware in person... But I would make sure to check the following:

- [ ] Confirm everything is wired up correctly
- [ ] Confirm sensor is powered sufficiently
- [ ] Where did you get the example code from? Is there a tutorial?
- [ ] Is the sensor exactly the same as the one used in the example code?
- [ ] Confirm the code is running properly
- [ ] Confirm baud rate is correct for the serial output to display the readings

comment.body: Hey Alex. Can you elaborate on what the problem is? Are you getting any readings from the sensor?
This is for the problem I am facing with the Ultrasonic Sensor. I'd like to find out what is wrong soon. I have gone through this for hours on end.

issue.title: Neopixel
issue.body:
Hieu, the ESP32 and the Neopixel are not on the desk with the sensor that you guys created yesterday. Where are they?
This could definitely be a problem...

comment.body: Hey! Thought you might be interested in this event: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/houston-social-good-hackathon-tickets-77033955635
